Nguyen Le Trong Nhan
IOS DEVELOPER
EXPERIENCE
Senior Developer
VNG CORP
 Apr 2016 - Ongoing
Zalo
Project description: An OTT product. Support chat, call, and
social network.
Technology (Obj-c)
- Optimize load & save messages flow to improve user experience.
- Using new design pattern to enhance code performance,
make code easy to implement new business and inheritlater.
- Customize UI with flexible animations, improve UI scrolling
faster and smoother.
- Multithreading for business logic and UI.
- API & Library: GCD, UIKit, CoreAnimation.
TSC Music
Project description: Play Music App
Technology (Swift)
- Use third-party API to load & play music in
local:(Youtubeptify..)
- Design UI/UX and Create animation for
Sleep Mode.
- Support many type of UI controllers
(UITableView, CollectionView, UIPicker..)
Associate Software Engineer
GIANTY COMPANY
7 Jan 2015 - Apr 2016
StixChat
Project description: App Chat app
Using face of user make a sticker, an user can edit sticker face
and share together.
Technology (Obj-c)
- Multi-thread: manage multi-thread to synchronize data,
building Sticker with user face, and download/upload data.
- Custom UI, Auto-layout: All of screen in apps are using
auto layout to support multiscreen. And custom UI,
design a lot of flexible animations.
Fresher Mobile Developer
